title: cgo getting confused by struct field name which is the same as a type #define
body:
First of all, I'm no C expert so I'm not sure whether the following is valid C, but it compiles and works OK with gcc on Linux. cgo also works but the field name is wrong. I ran into this with some library I was trying to use, more complicated code so I tried to put together a simple example.
See test.h and main.go files in the attached zip file.

[bug.zip](https://github.com/golang/go/files/63525/bug.zip)
